rules_text:
When Fairglade Weaver enters the battlefield, create an 8/8 green Elemental creature token.
Boon {G}{G}{W}{W} [i](Transform this permanent and attach it to target creature. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, lifelink, trample, and vigilance.
flavor_text2: [i]Dywen stumbled backwards and succumbed to his magnum opus.[/i]
